entry.tran: （与名词、形容词和副词连用构成形容词）表示“属于…的”，“归…所有的”
entry.def: -owned combines with nouns, adjectives, and adverbs to form adjectives that indicate who owns something.

example.ex: More than 50 state-owned companies have been sold since the early 1980s.
example.tran: 自20世纪80年代初以来，已有超过50家国有公司被出售。

example.ex: ...the Japanese-owned Bel Air Hotel in Los Angeles...
example.tran: 洛杉矶的日资贝尔艾尔酒店

means.word_mean: 1. having an owner; often used in combination;
